headline.print_headline: Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner Cleared for On-Time Delivery
headline.main: Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner Cleared for On-Time Delivery

docs.snippet: Boeing Co said on Monday that regulators have certified the 787-9 Dreamliner, clearing the way for the new, stretched jet's on-time arrival to its first customer, Air New Zealand, possibly later this month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Boeing Co said on Monday that regulators have certified the 787-9 Dreamliner, clearing the way for the new, stretched jet's on-time arrival to its first customer, Air New Zealand, possibly later this month.

headline.print_headline: Kahne Knows He's Got to Step It Up for Hendrick
headline.main: Kahne Knows He's Got to Step It Up for Hendrick

docs.snippet: Hendrick Motorsports likes things neat and clean and organized. NASCAR's top team works hard to avoid drama, and its way of doing business is a huge part of the organization's success....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hendrick Motorsports likes things neat and clean and organized. NASCAR's top team works hard to avoid drama, and its way of doing business is a huge part of the organization's success.

headline.print_headline: Shirokov's Absence Set to Hit Russia Hard
headline.main: Shirokov's Absence Set to Hit Russia Hard

docs.snippet: France and Colombia aren't the only teams without their best player at the World Cup....

headline.print_headline: Pressure on Santos to Reach Peace for Colombia
headline.main: Pressure on Santos to Reach Peace for Colombia

docs.snippet: The pressure is on President Juan Manuel Santos to accelerate peace efforts after pinning his re-election on 18-month-old negotiations to end Colombia's half-century conflict....
docs.lead_paragraph: The pressure is on President Juan Manuel Santos to accelerate peace efforts after pinning his re-election on 18-month-old negotiations to end Colombia's half-century conflict.

headline.print_headline: Same Engineer Designed Switches on 5.95 Million Recalled GM Cars
headline.main: Same Engineer Designed Switches on 5.95 Million Recalled GM Cars

docs.snippet: General Motors Co said the same engineer was responsible for the design of ignition switches on 5.95 million GM vehicles recalled this year....
docs.lead_paragraph: General Motors Co said the same engineer was responsible for the design of ignition switches on 5.95 million GM vehicles recalled this year.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo's Portugal Sputters in World Cup Opener
headline.main: Ronaldo's Portugal Sputters in World Cup Opener

docs.snippet: Portugal's start to the World Cup couldn't have been much worse: a 4-0 loss to Germany, a lackluster performance from Cristiano Ronaldo, a key defender sent off and another probably out of the tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: Portugal's start to the World Cup couldn't have been much worse: a 4-0 loss to Germany, a lackluster performance from Cristiano Ronaldo, a key defender sent off and another probably out of the tournament.

headline.print_headline: Medtronic, Covidien Match Up on Services Strategy Before Deal
headline.main: Medtronic, Covidien Match Up on Services Strategy Before Deal

docs.snippet: Well before Medtronic Inc and Covidien Plc announced their $43 billion merger, the two medical device makers had reached common conclusions about how they needed to change....
docs.lead_paragraph: Well before Medtronic Inc and Covidien Plc announced their $43 billion merger, the two medical device makers had reached common conclusions about how they needed to change.

headline.print_headline: Nephew of 'Duck Dynasty' Patriarch to Run for Congress
headline.main: Nephew of 'Duck Dynasty' Patriarch to Run for Congress

docs.snippet: The nephew of "Duck Dynasty" reality TV personality Phil Robertson said on Monday he would run for the U.S. House of Representatives in northeastern Louisiana as a conservative Republican....
docs.lead_paragraph: The nephew of "Duck Dynasty" reality TV personality Phil Robertson said on Monday he would run for the U.S. House of Representatives in northeastern Louisiana as a conservative Republican.

headline.print_headline: Libya Bans Car Traffic at Night in Benghazi to Stem Violence
headline.main: Libya Bans Car Traffic at Night in Benghazi to Stem Violence

docs.snippet: Libya has banned overnight car traffic in the eastern city of Benghazi to try to stem rising violence and anarchy, security officials said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Libya has banned overnight car traffic in the eastern city of Benghazi to try to stem rising violence and anarchy, security officials said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Germany Scores 4 Without a Striker in Lineup
headline.main: Germany Scores 4 Without a Striker in Lineup

docs.snippet: Coach Joachim Loew left Germany's all-time leading scorer on the bench in the World Cup opener against Portugal and it proved to be the right move....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coach Joachim Loew left Germany's all-time leading scorer on the bench in the World Cup opener against Portugal and it proved to be the right move.
